features.name: Pounce
features.description: If the deinonychus moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 12 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the deinonychus can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.description: The deinonychus makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (ld8 + 2) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft. one target. Hit: 6 (ld8_+Â·2) slashing damage.
